product_name: Wilderness Press Pacific Crest Trail - Oregon and Washington
long_description: Hike the crown jewel of the Pacific Northwest. Follow the Pacific Crest Trial as in meanders through towering volcanoes and sublime alpine meadows. Authors: Jeffery Schaffer, Andy Selter. Softcover; 350 pages; black and white photos, , 149 topographic strip maps. Wilderness Press; copyright 2004. Whether you plan to hike the entire length or take it a segment at a time, this guide assists with planning and day-to-day route information. Breaks this two-state section of the PCT into 12 manageable bits with road access at either end. Detailed notes and maps show camp, water and re-supply locations, as well as alternative routes, trail history and natural history.
short_description: Hike the crown jewel of the Pacific Northwest. Follow the Pacific Crest Trial as in meanders through towering volcanoes and sublime alpine meadows.
